      • writeImageToFile

        public static boolean writeImageToFile​(java.awt.image.RenderedImage image,
                                       java.lang.String fullPath,
                                       java.lang.String format)
        Writes an image using an arbitrary ImageWriterthat supports the given format to a File. If there is already a File present, its contents are discarded. Returns: Throws:
        Parameters:
        image - a RenderedImage to be written.
        fullPath - the full location containing the name and the directory of a file
        format - - a String containing the informal name of the format.
        Returns:
        false if no appropriate writer is found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if any parameter is null.
        IOException - if an error occurs during writing.

      • writeImageToFile

        public static boolean writeImageToFile​(java.awt.image.RenderedImage image,
                                       java.lang.String Path,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String format)
        Writes an image using an arbitrary ImageWriterthat supports the given format to a File. If there is already a File present, its contents are discarded. Returns: Throws:
        Parameters:
        image - a RenderedImage to be written.
        Path - the location containing only directory of a file
        name - the name of an image
        format - - a String containing the informal name of the format.
        Returns:
        false if no appropriate writer is found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if any parameter is null.
        IOException - if an error occurs during writing.

        The method that allows to scale an image or change the size of it
        Parameters:
        srcImg - the source of an image
        w - width to be set
        h - height to be set
        Returns:
        scaled image
